Investigation Title	ATAC-seq of in vitro primary neurons with or without Bach2 overexpression
Experiment Description	ATAC-seq of dissociated hippocampal neurons introduced with Control or Bach2-overexpression AAV at 6 days and cultured additional 8 days.

Experimental Factor Name	treatment
Experimental Factor Type	treatment
